T.query: select i.instance_id, s.stat_id  from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id

F.query: select i.instance_id, s.stat_id  from instances i right join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id
select i.instance_id, s.stat_id  from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.idx_tup_read
select i.instance_id, s.stat_id  from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id and i.instance_id = s.idx_tup_read
select i.instance_id, s.stat_id  from instances i right join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id and i.instance_id = s.idx_tup_read
